full_summary:
# Information about the Tender

* **Tender Title:** Computer Application Support
* **Organization Tendered for:** Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
* **Trade Agreement:** Eligible to bid on under the following free trade agreements:
  + Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
  + Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  + World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
  + Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  + Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
  + Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
  + Canada-EU Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
  + Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Notice Type:** RFP against Supply Arrangement
* **Expected Start Date:** July 24, 2023
* **Expected End Date:** June 21, 2024

* **Security Clearance:** Secret
* **Required Effort:** 1710 hours over 228 days
* **Quantity:** Temporary Help Services Requirement

## Additional Information

* A Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued to eligible suppliers for Temporary Help Services.
* The RFP is for Senior Computer Application Support with Supply Arrangement Holders under EN578-172870.
* Tender documents can be found on [insert link]
* For information on how to become a Qualified Supply Arrangement Holder, contact: tpsgc.pasat-apths.pwgsc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Contact Information:

* Danielle Blanchet 
  Telephone: 506-377-9624
  Email: [danielle.blanchet@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:danielle.blanchet@csc-scc.gc.ca)
